mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer (questNo, ansContent, ansLong, userId, ansDate) VALUES (#{qustNo}, #{answCont}, #{answLong}, #{memId}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT questNo FROM survQuest WHERE survNo = #{survNo}) AS qust INNER JOIN (SELECT questNo FROM ANSWER WHERE userId = #{userId}) AS answ ON qust.questNo = answ.questNo;
